Enjoy views of teak plantations and lush forests as you ascend to Waikabubak, where traditional settlements and the Sewah waterfalls await. Waikabubak, perched 400 meters above sea level, has charming streets where water buffalo roam. As you near NIHI, take in the stunning Wanokaka River Delta, alive with local tribesmen in the fields, anticipating the unique experience that awaits you in Sumba. NIHI Sumba is where rugged luxury meets unregulated freedom. There are a total of 27 villas, each unique in design and with views of the Indian Ocean. You can sunbathe beside your pool or find your zen with a yoga class, or participate in the many activities on offer showcasing the beauty of this part of Indonesia - waterfall treks, swimming with the Sumba sea horses, visiting local schools and mountain biking to name a few. NIHI Sumba is a true gem and has been voted 'The Best Hotel in the World' two years in a row. View more View less 5 nights + transfers, meals & more from $ 12,009 per person share twin.
